pr_title: interop-testing: log RPC failures for XdsTestClient

timeline.message: interop-testing: log RPC failures for XdsTestClient
interop-testing: log RPC failures for XdsTestClient

timeline.bodyText: This seems good. I may need to add a wait-for-channel-ready mechanism in the client to avoid log spam when the server and client are brought up together, as the first n rpcs will fail before the server is ready. Will see if that becomes necessary.
timeline.author: ericgribkoff
